nodes.text: A battle was fought at Mandallia between the Nagai and the Mandalorian Protectors during the early stages of the Nagai–Tof War. The Nagai had already established a number of bases in the Mandalore sector when the Mandalorians staged an assault on Mandallia. The cost of the battle was high, but the Nagai were eventually driven off of the planet. Shortly after, Fenn Shysa learned the invaders' next target was Mandalore itself.
